Package fil.sr1.commandhandler

Interface CommandHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
CdupCommand, CwdCommand, DeleCommand, ListCommand, MkdCommand, PassCommand, PasvCommand, PortCommand, PwdCommand, QuitCommand, RetrCommand, RmdCommand, RnfrCommand, RntoCommand, StorCommand, SystCommand, UserCommand
public interface CommandHandler
Define what a command handler should do. CommandHandlers are build by the CommandHandlerFactory class and are used by ClientFTP.
Author:
Adrien Holvoet and Anthony Mendez
